summary: Changes the Pale Housecarl, Gregor, to a Dunmer Sorcerer named Ralamus and changes his equipment to accommodate his new skills.
descriptionHtml:
For some reason I always get the feeling that Heljarchen Hall belongs more to Winterhold rather than Dawnstar. So it didn't bother me to alter the Housecarl from the Pale to a more College-going type: a Dunmer who excels at sorcery. The final entry in the Housecarl Requip Project, so expect a compilation soon.

Details: changes Gregor's class to Combat Sorcerer, replaces his equipment with a full Adept of Destruction outfit and provides him with several spells. Also, if you choose the Dunmer version, it changes his name to Ralamus, but it doesn't change his voice, because doing this could cause serious bugs.

Requirements: Hearthfire, nothing else.

Bugs: The Grey Face Bug is likely to occur when activating this mod after first encountering the Housecarl. So either use this on a save file in which you haven't encountered the affected NPC, or hope a more experienced modder comes up with a solution.

Installation: simply drag and drop the files into the Data folder and activate the .esp.

Load Order: as low as possible, especially if you have any other mods running that alter Gregor's appearance.

P.S., feel free to take screenshots of Gregor whilst running this mod and send them to me, I might add the pictures to the file. Also, if you want any other followers altered, send me a message, I enjoy doing this.

Permissions: If you want to have the file changed, just send me a message and what you want changed, and I'll probably give permission or do it myself.
author: pepertje
